cards.name: card1
cards.title: Exciting Adventure in the Amazon Rainforest
cards.text: Embark on a thrilling journey through the dense Amazon rainforest, encountering rare wildlife and breathtaking landscapes.

cards.name: card2
cards.title: Gourmet Cooking Class with a Celebrity Chef
cards.text: Learn the art of gourmet cooking from a renowned celebrity chef, using the finest ingredients and secret techniques.

cards.name: card3
cards.title: Unwind and Relax at a Secluded Island Resort
cards.text: Indulge in ultimate relaxation at a private island resort, with white sandy beaches and crystal-clear turquoise waters.

cards.name: card4
cards.title: Space Tourism: A Vacation Beyond the Stars
cards.text: Experience zero-gravity adventure and witness the Earth from space in this once-in-a-lifetime space tourism opportunity.

cards.name: card5
cards.title: Time Travel Expedition to Ancient Egypt
cards.text: Travel back in time to ancient Egypt, explore the pyramids, and unravel the mysteries of the pharaohs.
